SEARCH
Package sprouts

Interface Observable

All Known Subinterfaces:
Viewable<T>, Viewables<T>
public interface Observable
This represents an event that can be observed but not triggered. It is used to register Observers to, so that they can be notified when something happens. Contrary to events received by property observers, observing a Observable does not involve any state.
This is a super type of many other important sprouts classes, like Event, Val, Var, Vals and Vars.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static Observable
    cast(Event event)
    Casts the given Event to an Observable.
    Observable
    subscribe(Observer observer)
    Subscribes the given listener to this Observable so that it can be notified when something happens.
    Observable
    unsubscribe(Subscriber observer)
    Unsubscribes the given Subscriber from this Observable so that it will no longer be notified when something happens.
    void
    unsubscribeAll()
    Unsubscribes all listeners from this Observable.

  • Method Details

    • cast

      static Observable cast(Event event)
      Casts the given Event to an Observable. This is a convenience method that allows you to cast an Event to an Observable without having to use the Observable interface.
      Parameters:
      event - The Event to cast.
      Returns:
      The given Event cast to an Observable.

    • subscribe

      Observable subscribe(Observer observer)
      Subscribes the given listener to this Observable so that it can be notified when something happens. The cause of the notification is implementation dependent.
      Parameters:
      observer - The listener to subscribe.
      Returns:
      this Observable for chaining.

    • unsubscribe

      Observable unsubscribe(Subscriber observer)
      Unsubscribes the given Subscriber from this Observable so that it will no longer be notified when something happens. A Subscriber may be either an Observer or an Action depending on the context.
      Parameters:
      observer - the listener to unsubscribe.
      Returns:
      This Observable, to allow for chaining.

    • unsubscribeAll

      void unsubscribeAll()
      Unsubscribes all listeners from this Observable.
